original_text: And this thing became a sin; the people came to worship the one at Bethel and went as far as Dan to worship the other.
korean_text: 이 일이 죄가 되었으니 이는 백성들이 단까지 가서 그 하나에게 경배함이더라

sentences.original_text: And this thing became a sin
the people came to worship the one at Bethel
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 벧엘에 있는 하나를 경배하러 왔고

sentences.original_text: and went as far as Dan
